Instruction: Pat shrimp dry with paper towels.
Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant, be careful not to burn.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Pour white wine into the skillet and scrape up any browned bits from the bottom.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice into the skillet.
Stir in chopped parsley and red pepper flakes (if using).
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately with pasta, rice, or crusty bread.
